## useCheckResources() function

Check a principal's permissions on a set of resources.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useCheckResources(request: Omit<CheckResourcesRequest, "principal">, options?: RequestOptions): AsyncResult<CheckResourcesResponse>;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[AsyncResult](./react.asyncresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;[CheckResourcesResponse](./core.checkresourcesresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```typescript
const {isLoading, data:decision, error} = useCheckResources({
  resources: [
    {
      resource: {
        kind: "document",
        id: "1",
        attr: { owner: "user@example.com" },
      },
      actions: ["view", "edit"],
    },
    {
      resource: {
        kind: "image",
        id: "1",
        attr: { owner: "user@example.com" },
      },
      actions: ["delete"],
    },
  ],
});

decision?.isAllowed({
  resource: { kind: "document", id: "1" },
  action: "view",
}); // => true
```
